job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
Minimum Qualifications

  • Must have experience on DevOps tools
  • Bachelor’s Degree in related field preferred; proven industry experience.
  • 8+ years of software engineering, site reliability, architecture experience.
  • Experience supporting a 24 x 7 global operations environment with on-call responsibilities for production support.
  • Experience in supporting Disaster Recovery procedures
  • Experience in developing software applications using agile methodologies.
  • Experience in identifying application/infrastructure risks and mitigation strategy and the ability to work with a team to ensure risks are mitigated.
